enWisdom: The greedy one is never satisfied
The greedy person is a slave to [his] desires

Wisdom: الْحِرْصُ مُوقِعٌ فِي كَثِيرِ الْعُيُوبِ [كَبِيرِ الذُّنُوبِ‏]
enWisdom: Greed leads to many flaws (or great sins)

Wisdom: أَجْمِلُوا فِي الطَّلَبِ فَكَمْ مِنْ حَرِيصٍ خَائِبٌ وَمُجْمِلٍ لَمْ يَخِبْ
enWisdom: Be moderate in what you seek, for how many greedy people have been disappointed and how many who are moderate have not been unsuccessful!

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ حَرِيصٍ خَائِبٌ وَمُجْمِلٍ لَمْ يَخِبْ
enWisdom: Many a greedy person has been frustrated and many a contented person has not been disappointed!

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ حَرِيصاً لَمْ يَعْدَمِ الْإِهَانَةَ
enWisdom: One who acts greedily is not bereft of indignity
One whose greed increases, his certitude decreases
A greedy person has no shame
There is no magnanimity with avarice
There is no [good] health with gluttony
Good health and gluttony do not go together

Wisdom: يَسِيرُ الْحِرْصِ يَحْمِلُ عَلَى كَثِيرِ الطَّمَعِ
enWisdom: A little greed leads to a lot of cupidity
